item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: Hello This is my first blog with 191 words. Checking how the third line looks like Create 2 github repos. Hugo blog - Where you will be creating your blog Your username - Where you’ll be hosting the blog In local create hugo blog, add upstream origin to github Hugo blog repo commands hugo new site blog cd blog D:\Projects\hugo>cd blog D:\Projects\hugo\blog>git init Initialized empty Git repository in D:/Projects/hugo/blog/.git/ D:\Projects\hugo\blog>git branch -M ‘main’ D:\Projects\hugo\blog>git remote add origin https://github.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
